name: (UNFINISHED) BioBarracuda
description:
BioBarracuda, submitted for the Godot Wild Jam 41

Again, this is an unfinished project. I am still learning scope and unfortunately, this was just another one that did not stand up to the time limit.

As such, I was only able to add a single type of aggressive enemy, and there is no balancing.

Your goal is to get to the open ocean from the bottom of the cave system.

WASD to move around, Left Click to shoot your turrets. You can add free shotgun turrets by pressing the "+" key. Right click does a little dash, but there is no attack for that.

Unfortunately, Bella (my partner) made heaps of really cool art, but I could not fit it in, so she is credited despite only having minimal things on show. "Crab with a Knife" will live on.
